alert.note: Alert for Central Elko County; Western Elko County, northern Eureka and Lander Counties north of Interstate 80 (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 26 at 2:24PM PDT until July 27 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 11 PM PDT THURSDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 438 AND 469... The National Weather Service in Elko has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 1 PM to 11 PM PDT Thursday. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 438 W Elko County, N Eureka and Lander Counties N of I80 and Fire Weather Zone 469 Central Elko County. * Winds...West 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 9 percent. * Impacts...The combination of gusty winds and low humidity will create critical fire weather conditions along, and north of, I80.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Central Elko County; Western Elko County, northern Eureka and Lander Counties north of Interstate 80
